bryns_notebook.title: Bryn's Notebook
bryns_notebook.naive description: Bryn's personal notebook. It's sealed shut with a tiny padlock... Not that you were going to read it anyway.
bryns_notebook.hidden description: Bryn's personal notebook. It's sealed shut with a tiny padlock... Not that you were going to read it anyway.

factory_access_permit.title: Factory Access Permit
factory_access_permit.naive description: A permit that grants you access to the Nimbus III Maintenance Facility.

bipolar_junction_transistor.title: Bipolar Junction Transistor
bipolar_junction_transistor.naive description: It looks like a mechanical part of sorts.
bipolar_junction_transistor.hidden description: Beeker says this is required to build a special kind of gun. You should hold on to it.

willets_floppy_disc.title: Willet's Floppy Disc
willets_floppy_disc.naive description: Contains schematics for the Greatwing, which we will need in order to stop Skycorps from taking over the island. Dr. Willet told me to bring it to someone named Spencer in Ashtown.
willets_floppy_disc.hidden description: Contains schematics for the Greatwing. Spencer needs a track zero sensor and a fresh head motor to access its contents.

track_zero_sensor.title: Track Zero Sensor
track_zero_sensor.naive description: A small sensor that Spencer needs to repair his floppy disc drive. Without it, he can't access the Greatwing schematics.

head_motor.title: Head Motor
head_motor.naive description: A tiny motor that Spencer needs to access Doc Willet's floppy disc.

gas_mask.title: Gas Mask
gas_mask.naive description: You need this to navigate the Toxic Cavern without dying.

firstwind_deck_key.title: Firstwind Deck Key
firstwind_deck_key.naive description: A small iron key that grants you access to the Firstwind's outer deck.

woodshine_warehouse_key.title: Woodshine Warehouse Key
woodshine_warehouse_key.naive description: Allows you to enter Woodshine's warehouse.

nimbus_iii_boiler_room_key.title: Nimbus III Boiler Room Key
nimbus_iii_boiler_room_key.naive description: Allows you to enter Nimbus III's boiler room.
